citizen.name: Citizen
citizen.desc: The highest tower in Metrotown, Citizen is a 66-story tower with unparalleled views.

akimbo.name: Akimbo
akimbo.desc: Akimbo's bold exterior will define the Brentwood skyline with its unique angled architecture and offset balconies.

komo.name: Komo
komo.desc: Experience a harmonious blend of effortless connectivity & tranquil repose with breathtaking mountain views from Burquitlam.

harlin.name: Harlin
harlin.desc: A gateway tower to the Waterfront pathways of the River District, where luxury living meets unrivaled convenience.

eminence.name: Eminence
eminence.desc: Eminence offers a quiet, amenity-rich community bordering Kelowna's largest natural park area.

elmwood.name: Elmwood
elmwood.desc: Bold architecture, modern interiors and resort inspired amentities - home is alive with design and lifestyle.

band.name: Band
band.desc: Townline presents a 45 storey tower that commands attention in vibrant West Coquitlam.

georgetown.name: Georgetown 2
georgetown.desc: Georgetown 2 is the second phase of Georgetown, A vibrant master planned community by Anthem located in the heart of Surrey City Centre.

southgate.name: Southgate City
southgate.desc: A stunning blend of urban and aesthetic design, overlooking the slopes of South Burnaby.

contour.name: Contour
contour.desc: With less than 5 homes per plate, every home comes with an oversized balcony and feels like a true corner.

o2.name: O2
o2.desc: 285 Studio to Three Bedroom Homes where health is at the fore front and wellness is integrated into every aspect of the design.

perla.name: Perla
perla.desc: A 220-acre front yard for you to enjoy steps away from Perla, central park offers year-round beauty and lively spaces for fun events.

hamilton.name: Hamilton
hamilton.desc: Hamilton is Mosaic's third community up at SFU and is made up of 115 concrete apartments in the heart of UniverCity.

oasis.name: Oasis
oasis.desc: Club Oasis is a unique recreational experience that provides the relaxing feel of an island resort within the comfort of your own home.

brentwood-tower.name: Amazing Brentwood Tower 6
brentwood-tower.desc: With only 369 homes, Tower Six is our rarest and most exclusive home offering to date.

south-yards.name: South Yards
south-yards.desc: Anthem's highly anticipated South Yards in Brentwood offers 2,500 homes, retail space, and a one-acre park.
